attributes.action: intervene personally with the Brazilian President to ask Brazil to fulfil its obligations under the Hague Convention on child abduction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brazil and the UK are both signatories to the Hague Convention on international child abduction. Since signing the convention, Brazil has failed to return even a single child, despite the courts having ordered their return. It is essential that the Prime Minister raise this matter with the Brasilian President.
